specifications.Characteristics: Yarn Effect > High Twist Yarn High twist yarn is made by tightly twisting staple fibers or filament yarns, resulting in a higher number of twists per unit length. It adds texture, a crisp feeling, and a cool touch to the fabric.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Do not iron
